aboutPage.title: About Keskess Consulting
aboutPage.subtitle: Defined by a commitment to system autonomy and long-term stability
aboutPage.intro: Keskes Consulting is a Munich-based consultancy focused on the architecture and auditing of data systems. We operate at the intersection of business logic and technical execution, providing the specialized engineering required to turn data into a reliable corporate asset.

items.title: Technical Auditing
items.description: We provide objective assessments for investment rounds and internal system overhauls. We verify data integrity, identify scalability bottlenecks, and uncover hidden risks within the infrastructure.

items.title: Analytics Engineering
items.description: We handle the full implementation cycle, building the underlying pipelines and models required for accurate, automated reporting. Our focus is on creating lean architectures that minimize maintenance and technical debt.

items.title: Onboarding and Handover
items.description: A core component of our delivery is to give the client full ownership of the data infrastructure. We provide the logic maps and structural documentation required to navigate the environment, finalized with a functional handover for a clean transition.

items.title: Logic-First Implementation
items.description: Technical decisions are driven by specific business objectives. We prioritize functional utility over tool-based hype.

items.title: Architecture Stability
items.description: We utilize proven, reliable technologies that ensure long-term efficiency and predictable infrastructure costs.

items.title: Institutional Transparency
items.description: Every project is delivered with clear structural documentation. We ensure that business logic, KPI definitions, and system maps remain a permanent, interpretable asset of the company.

serviceDetails.readySubtitle: Let's discuss how {service} can help your business transform and grow.

due-diligence.title: Data Due Diligence
due-diligence.description: Independent data verification for VCs, PEs, and Private Investors. We support investors in making informed decisions through independent, third-party data due diligence. We provide a premium offering that validates the figures presented by target companies and uncovers possible gaps in their reporting infrastructure.
benefits: Full KPI Verification: Verify that reported business metrics are both accurate and reproducible. Integrity Check ensures KPIs reflect real business performance and are traceable to reliable data sources. Logic Validation confirms that formulas and definitions are technically sound and consistent.

Data System Review: Assess whether the startup's data architecture supports long-term business objectives. Risk Assessment spots hidden technical risks that could cause future cost explosions. Infrastructure Maturity evaluates the system's ability to handle increased volume without crashing.

Documentation & Bus Factor Audit: Evaluate the organizational resilience of the technical environment. Knowledge Retention audits system documentation to ensure the architecture is transparent and accessible. Assess the system collapse risk if a key team member leaves.

Evaluation Package: The audit concludes with a comprehensive due diligence report for every layer of company's data environment. Executive Risk Summary provides a high-level breakdown of critical technical findings, Standardized Risk Matrix offers numerical scoring across infrastructure and stability, and Technical Deep-Dive presents raw evidence and architectural observations.

strategy.title: Data Strategy Consulting
strategy.description: Defining the steps to a functional data operation that survives the test of time. Whether you're establishing a data system or optimizing an existing setup, we provide the high-level advisory to build a system that serves you, not the other way around.
benefits: Cost Optimization: Uncovering the hidden saving potential within data systems through a rigorous technical audit. Efficiency Analysis finds cost traps such as KPI bloat and abandoned automated processes. Lean Infrastructure cuts long-term operating expenses across cloud services and staffing. Review your tech stack to identify overlapping tools and subscriptions.

Detailed Execution Roadmaps: A practical blueprint built for your specific budget and priorities. Framework Design defines custom KPIs and scalable data governance models. Technology Selection provides vetted, vendor-neutral tool and software recommendations with comprehensive cost breakdowns and TCO projections.

Lean Systems: Preventing overspend by recommending solutions designed for your business needs. Predictability First focuses on proven, scalable technologies that ensure the system stays stable and costs stay visible.
Validated Innovation: We bypass industry buzzwords in favor of durable, stable solutions. Integrating emerging trends only when they provide competitive advantage and measurable business value.

analytics.title: Full Cycle Analytics
analytics.description: Every piece of data should lead to a business decision. We handle the entire process from tech to business, turning your raw data into insights that accurately reflect performance.
benefits: KPIs that Matter: You don't need more KPIs, you need the right ones. Built for Action with only relevant and decision-ready KPIs selected and processed. Cross-Product Alignment designs a single data language for consistent measurement across departments. Dynamically Refreshed numbers based on your business operations.

Reliable Data Infrastructure: Building solid foundations for accurate reporting. Data Source Integration investigates scattered tables and databases to reveal the single source of truth. Value Oriented with ROI at the heart of every technical step. Automated Pipelines maximize uptime and eliminate manual processes.

Scalable for The Future: Building for where your company is going, ensuring the architecture stays solid as your data grows while prioritizing lean infrastructure that does the job without piling up technical debt.

Technical Partnership: Supporting your teams to set the guidelines for how your company collects and uses data. Transparency ensures at project completion we provide documents detailing KPI formulas, data flows, and technical infrastructure processes.

workshops.title: The Rational Data Workshop
workshops.description: Preparing your team for modern data challenges. Our sessions require no prior technical background or pre-work. We provide high-impact, hands-on training designed to develop data competence within your existing team structure.
benefits: Dashboard Sprint: Unleashing true self-service reporting through a time-efficient, intensive workshop. Real-World Context trains exclusively on your internal data and specific KPIs. Immediate Result ensures every participant builds a functional, business-ready dashboard within a single session. The 'Unbreak' Logic teaches universal data principles to troubleshoot with confidence.

Executive Data Intelligence: Transform data into boardroom decisions. Analytical Precision catches data traps, misleading visualizations, and statistical distortions. Data-Business Translation gains the technical ground to turn business goals into executable solutions. Prioritizing Initiatives filters out noise to select projects based on your business scale.

Specialized Deep Dives: Intensive targeted sessions focused on specific areas. AI Tool Integration leverages LLMs and automated workflows in real-world scenarios. Data Security & Governance applies best practices for secure and compliant data environments. Data Documentation ensures smart collaboration through staff transitions.

Zero-Friction Entry: No technical prerequisites or pre-work required. Pre-Session Audits ensure content is completely relevant to your current data and business. Risk-Free Environments conducted in dedicated sandboxes for fearless experimentation. High-Touch On-Site Engagement capped at 12 participants to ensure every individual leaves with a proven, functional skill set.
